text: U ji bona wane, ku karen sikati dikin heya, ku gava yek ji wan amadeyi mirine dibe; di we gave da gotiye: “A, di naha da ez ji wan kirinan posman bume.” U ji bona wane, ku bi fileti dimirin posmaniya wan ji gunehan tune ye (yani posmaniya wanen di we gave da naye lite kirine). Sixwa evan in, ku me ji bona wan ra sapatek e dilsoz amade kiriye
